data.enText: that you can get, buy or find
data.chText: 可获得的；可购得的；可找到的
可利用的资源 / 设备
可以容易 / 免费 / 让公众 / 普遍得到的

data.enText: Tickets are available free of charge from the school.
When will the information be made available ?
data.chText: 何时才可以了解到情况？

data.enText: Further information is available on request.
This was the only room available.
We'll send you a copy as soon as it becomes available .
data.chText: 一有货我们就会给你寄一本去。

data.enText: Every available doctor was called to the scene.
data.chText: 所有能找到的医生都被召集到了现场。

data.enText: free to see or talk to people
Will she be available this afternoon?
The director was not available for comment.
data.chText: 主管没有时间发表意见。

data.enText: This offer is subject to availability .
data.chText: 优惠至此产品售完为止。

simple_means.memory_skill: avail 有利,有用 + -able 可...的

ex.zh: 目前可得的；目前有空的

tr: obtainable or accessible and ready for use or service
example: much information is available through computers
the list of available candidates is unusually long
the house is available after July 1
2000 square feet of usable office space
he was not available for comment
he was available and willing to accompany her

example.ex: Since 1978, the amount of money available to buy books has fallen by 17%...
example.tran: 自1978年以来，可用于采购图书的经费已经减少了17％。

example.ex: There are three small boats available for hire...
According to the best available information, the facts are these.
example.tran: 根据最可靠的消息，事实如下。

value.def: If something you want or need is available, you can find it or obtain it.

example.ex: Mr Leach is on holiday and was not available for comment.
example.tran: 利奇先生休假了，不方便作出评论。

value.def: Someone who is available is not busy and is therefore free to talk to you or to do a particular task.

trans: 可供…之用的，有效期为，能参加（出席）…的
有效数据；可获得的信息；现有资料；资料；现有数据
可利用水；有效水；可用水分；有效水分；可用水
可用空间；可用间隙或牙弓现有长度；船舶可用空间；可用间隙
可利用时间；可用时间；时间；空余时间；有效时间
可用能力；可用容量；可用产能；有效容量；产能可得
可用材料；可生产材质；材料

partsOfSpeech.dec: enjoy v.享受的乐趣 + -able 可...的
admir(e) 钦佩;赞美 + -able 可...的
un- 否定 + bear v.携带 + -able 可...的
un- 否定 + believ(e) 相信 + -able 可...的
valu(e) 价值,重视 + -able 可...的
advis(e) 建议,劝告 + -able 可...的
ap- 朝,向 + lic 准许 + -able 可...的
con- 共同, 一起 + sider- 星星 + -able 可...的
in- 不,无 + dis- 分开,分离 + pens 悬挂 + -able 可...的
suit n.一套衣服 + -able 可...的
vari- 变化,多变 + -able 可...的
in- 不,无 + numer 数目 + -able 可...的
favor 喜欢,支持 + -able 可...的
soci 同伴,结交,联合 + -able 可...的
not(e) 留意,注意 + -able 可...的
in- 不,无 + valu(e) 价值,重视 + -able 可...的
